content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's my pleasure to show you the apartment. I'm sure you'll find it to be a great living space. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I believe the apartment is quite nice, especially considering its location in the city center. However, as a student, I'm on a tight budget. I was hoping we could negotiate a price that would be more suitable for me. What is the lowest rent you would consider?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I'm always looking to get the best deal for my property. However, I'm willing to work with you on the price if you're a serious tenant. What is your highest price you could afford?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm very interested in the apartment and I'm a very responsible tenant. I'm looking to pay no more than 650 Euros per month, including all utilities. This is my absolute maximum, and I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 650 Euros is much lower than my asking price. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the value of the apartment, especially given its prime location. I'm willing to negotiate, but I can't go that low. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position. I'm willing to increase my offer to 700 Euros per month. This is my final offer, as it's the absolute maximum I can afford while still maintaining a comfortable living situation. I hope we can agree on this price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 700 Euros is still below my expectations for the apartment. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the quality and location of the property. If you're serious about renting the apartment, I would expect you to come closer to my asking price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm a serious tenant and I'm willing to pay 725 Euros per month. This is my absolute final offer. I believe it's a fair price for both parties considering the current market and my financial situation as a student. I hope you can accept this offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 725 Euros is still not sufficient for the apartment. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the value of the property, which is higher than what you've offered. If you're unable to meet my expectations, I'll have to consider other potential tenants.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. However, as a student, my budget is limited. I'm willing to pay 750 Euros per month, which I believe is a fair and reasonable offer, given the current market and my financial situation. I hope this proposal can meet your expectations.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 750 Euros is closer to my expectations, but it's still not quite there. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the prime location and the quality of the apartment. If you're unable to meet my asking price, I'll have to consider other potential tenants who can offer more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm sorry to hear that. I've reached my financial limit with this offer of 750 Euros per month. If you believe there are other potential tenants who can offer more, I completely understand. I've done my best to present a fair offer based on the current market and my budget as a student. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your effort, but I must decline your offer. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the true value of the property. If you're unable to meet my asking price, I'll have to consider other potential tenants who can offer more. Thank you for your time and effort in negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your decision. I've made my best offer based on my financial situation as a student. If you find a tenant who can offer more, I wish you the best. Thank you for considering my offer and for your time.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your understanding. I'll continue to seek a tenant who can offer a rent that reflects the true value of the property. Good luck with your search for an apartment, and I hope you find one that meets your needs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your time and wish you the best of luck in finding a suitable tenant. If you have any other properties or if the price of this one changes in the future, I would be interested in revisiting the negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your interest, Yi-Nuo. If you're open to considering other locations or if you come across a property that aligns better with your budget, I'd be happy to discuss it with you. Good luck with your apartment search, and I hope you find a place that meets your needs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'll keep your offer in mind and let you know if anything changes. Goodbye, and thank you again for your time.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Goodbye, Yi-Nuo. I hope you find a place that suits you well. If you have any further questions or if you're interested in other properties, feel free to contact me. Good luck!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I will contact you if I have any further questions or if I'm interested in other properties. Goodbye!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Goodbye, Yi-Nuo. I hope you find a place that meets your needs. If you ever need assistance with your search or have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out. Good luck!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your help and kindness. I will contact you if I have any further questions or if I'm interested in other properties. Goodbye! TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
